actions.committee: Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to provide for the establishment of the Plymouth Rock National Memorial.

summary.text: Provides for the establishment of the Plymouth Rock National Memorial in the town of Plymouth, Massachusetts. Authorizes to be appropriated such sums as necessary to carry out the purposes of this Act.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the establishment of the Plymouth Rock National Memorial.
